english: (Music)
(Music)
Come on!
Come on!
Turgut!
(Music)

text: Ya ikisini de bırakın ya da hepinizi öldürün. Sen bizi atlağın mı zannettin?
english: Either leave them both or you all die. Do you think we are fools?
(Music)
Get out of the way! I could not explain.

text: Ya ikisini de bırakırsınız ya da hepinizi öldürün. Son kez söylüyorum bırak!
english: Either you leave them both or you all die. I am saying it for the last time! Let them go!
Yigit! Yigit! Yigit!
Damn it!
We need to stop this bloodshed.
Okun is inside.

text: İlk önce onu çıkarmamız lazım. Hallederiz, evelallah.
english: We need to get him out first. We'll take care of it.
Come on, Bismillah. Come on.
I'm sorry.

text: Rahşel sevgili kızım. Zekâna ne kadar güvendiğimi bilirsin.
english: Rahsel, my dear daughter. You know how much I trust Zekai.

text: Onun için sana en zor görevi verdim.
english: That's why I gave you the hardest mission.

text: Senin görev yerin Kayıların obası olacak. Yolunuz açık olsun.
english: Your place of duty will be the Kayi tribe. May God speed you.
We didn't understand what you were trying to do sir.
And me, my dear knight.

text: Bu küçük kudretli ordun tüm İslam dünyasına...
english: I will send this small powerful army to the whole Islamic world...
...will spread the curse of the devil. There is no rush from tomorrow.

text: Kervan için obanın satılacak malzemelerini toplayacaksın.
english: You will collect the materials for the caravan.

text: Üç gün içinde de kervanı yola çıkaracaksın.
english: You will set off the caravan in three days.
My Bey, why do you trade your goods?

text: Kara Toygar'ın niyeti kötü. Kervanı basabilir. İşte bu yüzden malları tacirin eline veremeyiz.
english: Kara Toygar has a bad intention. He could kill us. That is why we cannot give the goods to the trader.
I will do this with the Alps in Gundogdu.

text: Emrin olur baba. Ne istersin bey oğlu?
english: As you wish, father. What do you want, son of a Bey?

text: Sizden yurt almaya geldim. Peki karşılığında ne vereceksin?
english: I came to get a house from you. What will you give in return?
If you give us a place...

text: Karşılığında iki bin tane alp başın her dara düştüğünde yanında olacak.
english: In return, 2,000 Alps will be with you when you are in trouble.

text: Benim sarayımın muhafızlarının sayısı bile bundan fazla.
english: My palace has more guards than this.
Godspeed, son.
Next. My Bey. Next.
My Bey. Come on!
Come on!

text: Muhafızların üç eksik say. Sizle nasıl anlaşacağız Türkmen?
english: The guards. Three missing. How are we going to deal with you, Turkmen?

text: Obamız için bereketli bir kışlak isteriz.
english: We want a blessed winter for our tribe.

text: Kışlak. Önce kışlak istersiniz, sonra olur o yaylak.
english: Winter. First you want winter clothes, then that skirt.

text: Sonra bir de yurt istersiniz siz.
english: Then you want a home.
Right. We want.
God!

text: Sen kumla taşıyamayacağı yüklemezsin. Bütün obanın yükünü omzuma koydun.
english: You are a burden that you cannot carry on your shoulders. You have put the burden of the whole tribe on my shoulders.

text: Bana bu yükün altına kalkmayı nasip et.
english: God, please let me be under this burden.
(Music)
Come on.
The flag of the Turkish people is still there.
Fire!
(Music)
Wake up, son.
Come on!
Come on!
(Music)
Thank you, my God.
What did you talk about at dinner?

text: Ne istiyormuş Elaziz'den? Kayılar. Kışlamak için yer istediler emirden.
english: What does El Aziz want? Kayis. They asked for a place to stay for the winter.
You should take what the Kayis want.
How? I don't understand.
The yurt they will take.

text: Haçlı Kontluğun sınırlarında olsun. Sadece Ertuğrul değil, soyunu da kurutmak için bundan daha iyi bir fırsat olamaz.
english: He should be at the border of the Crusaders. He can't have a better chance than this to establish his lineage......not only Ertugrul.

text: Size istediğiniz yurdu vermeye karar verdik Beyoğlu.
english: We decided to give you the country you wanted, son of Bey.

text: Doğrusu bizi buna Nasır ikna etti.
english: Nasir convinced us to do this.

text: Burayı biliyor musun? Asiye Nehri'nin batısı.
english: Do you know this place? It's the west of the Aasian River.

text: Topraklarının bereketli olduğunu duydum. Düşmanları da bereketlidir.
english: I heard that their lands are prosperous. Their enemies are prosperous too.
We will build a tent in the sky.
We will drive our men to the villages without any way out.

text: Pusatlarımızı yar eyleyip ordularımızı gür kılacağız.
english: We will make our armies strong by making our weapons strong.

text: Tamgamız yedi iklimde adaletin sancağı diye dalgalanacak.
english: Our flag will be waved as the flag of justice in seven seasons.

text: İlahi Muştumuzu dağların denizlerin ötesine taşıyacağız.
english: We will carry our divine idol beyond the mountains and seas.
Attack!
Come on!
Ah!
No!
Go!
Stop!
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
About the treasures!
Come on! Pity. So pity.

text: Bunların hiç birini hak etmedin Gündoğdu.
english: You did not deserve any of this, Gundogdu.
I told your father.

text: Esirleri vermezsen gök kubbeyi başına yıkarım.
english: If you do not give me the prisoners, I will destroy the sky.
Let him think now.
Your rituals?
Or will he choose his son?
(Music)
Catch him! Stop him! Stop him!
(Music)
(Music)
The whole tribe is starving.
The famine is everywhere.
We could not even get to one of the streams. Why?

text: Çünkü beyimizin çıbanlı başı dertte. Bütün oba halkı senin yaşlılığından şikayetçi.
english: Because our Bey's head is in trouble. The whole tribe is complaining about your old age.
(Music)
(Music)
I will beat you to death.
I said.
I'm back, father.

text: Dualarım kabul oldu. Çok şükür kabul oldu.
english: My prayers have been answered. Thank God, they have.
We have a coat now.

text: Lakin işimiz hiç kolay değil. Kayı kolay olana talip olmaz evlat. Evelallah.
english: But our job is not easy. A Kayi does not seek easy things, son. Yes, my Bey.
We will overcome all difficulties.
Yes, God willing.
Welcome, Aslan.
My son, you came with this good news.

text: Rabbim senin iki canlı mutlu kılsın.
english: May God bless you with two lives.
I need it.
...and your family.
Mother. My dear mother. My dear mother.
May God protect you.
May God protect you.
Now, take a rest.
You will join the council.
...and he will be the first...
You will give the moustache I brought from Aleppo.

text: O zaman meseleyi eline boyuna konuşuruz hep beraber.
english: Then we will talk about it together.

text: Müsaade varsa istirahate çekilmeden önce bir işim var.
english: If you allow me, I have something to do before I go to bed.
I want to take care of him.
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
Come on!
(Music)
Thank God.

text: Tam umudumuzun bittiği anda Ertuğrul'u çıkardın karşımıza.
english: You brought Ertugrul to us when we were out of hope.
He made him powerful against the oppressors.

text: Şimdi de iyi haberlerle sağ salim dönmeyi nasip et.
english: Now, please return safely with good news.
Ertugrul.
I learned from Aykiz that you're here.
Were you scared? I wasn't scared.
I'm surprised you're here so soon.

text: Sana söylemedim mi? Atımı hiç durmadan süreceğim. Tez gelip tez geleceğim demedim mi?
english: Didn't I tell you? I will drive my horse constantly. Didn't I tell you that I will come and go quickly?
You said it. I kept my word.
(Music)
I brought good news from Aleppo.
Did you forget?

text: Yeni bir yurt var mı gidecek?
english: Will he go to a new home?
Yes. Thank God.

text: O bu halkı sonunda rahat bir nefes alacak.
english: He will finally breathe a good breath.
Everyone watched Yunus.
Aykiz, mostly.
Aykiz mostly?
I mean......my parents.
The babies that are sleeping in the cold of the spring.
Everyone. All of us. THE JOURNEY OF LOVE
I'm going to the hospital.

text: Hiç yanımdan ayırmadım. Karşılaştığım her zorlukta bana güç verdi.
english: I didn't leave her alone. She gave me strength in every difficulty I faced.

text: Ne zaman tara düşsem, senin de benim yanımda olduğunu hatırlattı bana.
english: Whenever I fell down, she reminded me that you were with me.
I bought these from Aleppo for you.
For me?
(Music)
This is very nice, Ertugrul Bey.

text: Benim gördüğüm güzelliği senin de görmeni istedim.
english: I wanted you to see the beauty I see.
(Music)
Everything is like a dream.

text: Ama her rüya gibi bunun da bir sonu var.
english: But every dream has an end.
What happened Halime?
Are you tired?
Kara Toygar.
He attacked the tribe and tried to kidnap us.

text: O bizim peşimizi asla bırakmayacak Ertugrul.
english: He will never leave us, Ertugrul.
Be happy.
I hope so.
I will never leave you.
(Music)
(Music)
Is my father's death anniversary today?
It's been eight years.
I wish I could cry.
If it was a grave I could pray for...
Not for your father's death.
You should pray for him to live.
I am sorry.

text: Babanın cesedini bugüne kadar kimse görmedi.
english: No one has seen father's body until today.

text: Kim bilir belki de hayattadır. Sevgili kızıyla bir gün karşılaşacağı hayali onu hayatta tutuyordur.
english: Who knows, maybe she's alive. Maybe she's dreaming about meeting her daughter one day.
(Music)
I'm going to the market.
I'm going to the market.
I'm going to the market.
I'm going to the market.
I'm going to the market.

text: Ne vakit geldi de bu uğursuzla buluştu?
english: When did he meet this bastard?
Good luck, aunt.

text: Ertugrul Bey'imiz gelir gelmez bu kızın yanında almış Sulu Ana.
english: Ertugrul Bey came and went to see this girl, mother Sulu.

text: Öyle nereden gelirler? Yan yana nasıl yürürler?
english: Where do they come from? How do they walk side by side?

text: Bir işin aslını bilip bilmeden içine fesatlık sokma Selcan.
english: Don't get into trouble before you know the truth, Selcan.
Nobody benefits from these things.

text: Ertuğrul geldiğinde ilk önce bizim elimizi öptü.
english: Ertugrul first killed us when he came here.

text: Vallahi bu misafirlik konusunu bir an önce halletmemiz lazım ana.
english: We have to deal with this hospitality matter as soon as possible, mother.

text: Bey babam bu olanları bilmiyor görmüyor. Bu kızın ocağımıza kastı var.
english: My father does not know or see these things. This girl is here for us.
What will you do?

text: Eliniz işlesin. Dünya kadar iş var.
english: I'll leave it to you. There is work to be done.
Come on.
Suleyman Shah.

text: Ne dedi beyim? Ertugrul Halep'ten dönmüş.
english: What did he say, my Bey? Ertugrul is back from Aleppo.
He took it from El Aziz.
Ertugrul is out of our hands.

text: Sen Kurdoğlu Bey'inde oyun tükenir mi sanırsın?
english: Do you think that Kurdoglu Bey is out of his mind?

text: Elbet bizim de bir hesabımız var.
english: Of course we have our own plans.
(Music)

text: Deli Demir! Kefenenin kılıcı seninkinden hallice. Yat oğlum!
english: Deli Demir, the sword of Kefere is better than yours. Come son.

text: Nereden buldun bu eşek sopasını? Geberttiğimiz açlılardan.
english: Where did you find this donkey's stick? From the places we killed.

text: Gahur pusu alttan ne anlar bak.
english: Look what he's got from that bastard Pusat.
That's what you call a man who sells.

text: Elif gibi eğri olacak. Yiğidin bileğine oturacak. Çeliğe baş olacak.
english: He will be as agile as Elif. He will sit on the arm of a brave man. He will be the head of a heron.

text: Kara Toygar'ın adamları Halime'nin çadırı basmış Deli Demir.
english: Kara Toygar's men raided Halime's tent, Deli Demir.
Is that right?
Right Ertugrul. He was a coward but...
He took it from the size of his neck.

text: Ben sana o çadırı namus bilesin diye emanet ettim.
english: I entrusted that tent to you so that you would be honored.

text: Nasıl olur da burnumuzun dibine kadar gelip çadır basarlar? Haklısın Ertuğrul.
english: How could they come to our den and set up a tent? You are right, Ertugrul.
Thinner than a dog's neck.
Just a momentary heed.
Take him and shoot him.
I swear I will not shed a single tear.

text: Yine de sağ olasın Demir Usta.
english: Thank you again, Master Demir.

text: Senin sayende hayatı kurtulmuş bir hiç hâlde. Yok, yok.
english: It's a cure for your life. No, no.
Not just me.

text: Bir de Avşin, obaya gelen tüccarın adamıymış.
english: And Afsin was the man who came to the tribe.

text: Ama biliyor musun Ertuğrul her şeyde bir hayır var.
english: But you know Ertugrul, everything has a good side.

text: Eğer o itler iyice kudurup obaya gelip...
english: If those dogs come to the tribe and...
If they didn't attack Halime...
...in the night.
They will run away.
Or outside the tribe?

text: Başka bir yerde iyice çullansalardı hiçbirimizin haberi olmazdı.
english: If they were hiding somewhere else, we wouldn't know anything.
Halime's. They will escape, Azize.
That's it.
Is Afsin in Tepe?
Look at the caravan's footman Ali.
I'm sorry.

text: Halime. Ertuğrul Bey'im gelir gelmez seni sordu. Öyle bir gidişi vardı ki arkandan görecektin. Biz de birazdan buluşacağız Turgut'umla.
english: Halime. Ertugrul Bey asked you about you. He was so busy that you were going to see him. We will meet soon, Turgut.
(Music)
My heart is beating fast when I'm away.

text: Çok şükür döndüler ya sağ salim. Hem de güzel haberlerle.
english: Thank God, they are back safely and with good news.

text: Sabrın sonu selamettir Aykız. Düğünümüz yakındır artık. Ay heyecandan elime yan buz kesti baksana.
english: Patience is the best thing, Aykiz. Our wedding is near. I am so excited that my hands are frozen.
Did Ertugrul Bey take this?
It's very nice.

text: Demek oralarda da seni düşünüp dururmuş Halime.
english: So Halime is thinking about you there.
Think about it, Aykiz.
Why do you say that, my beautiful Halime?
You are not in the mood, Beylik.

text: Canını yakan bir şey mi var?
english: Is there something that hurts you?
So that we do not get burned.
I had to run away for the rest of my life.

text: İlk defa gitmek zorunda olduğum için canım acıyor.
english: I am in pain because I have to go for the first time.
I know...
I don't know why you ran away.
Actually, I do not care.
But I know this, Halime.
You are not alone anymore.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im ne gitmene izin verir?
english: Ertugrul Bey will not let you go.
or anything bad happens to you.
I am coming.
Eleonora, you are sad.
Even the pigeons of sorrow have gone to sleep.
I'm in the land where my father died.

text: Bir kez olsun onun mezarına dua etmek istiyorum.
english: I want to pray for his grave.
Now, we are going to the next step.
...the most well-known...
He was so brave.
Before the Turks killed my father...

text: Onu en son gören sendin Meryem.
english: You were the last one to see him, Mario.
I looked at him and said...
They ruined my life.

text: Tipsiz bir kuyu kadar kör olan gözlerimin gördüğü son şey baban oldu.
english: The last thing my eyes saw, as blind as a drop of water, was your father.
What if my father is not dead?
While I was bleeding...
I dug it with my nails and buried it in the ground.

text: Gözlerin körken gömdüğünü söylüyorsun babama. Ya gömdüğünü zannettiğin kişi? Babam değil de bir başkasıysan. Senelerce hizmet ettiğim efendimi nasıl tanımam Eleonora?
english: You say that your father is blind when your eyes are blind. What if your father is someone you think is blind? How can I recognize my master whom I served for years, Eleonora?
I have to go.
Excuse me, dear.
Farewell, Nuran.
I'm going to a mission I can't go back to without finishing.
I wanted to say goodbye to you.
I'll come back to you.
Titus.

text: Bu mektubu kız kardeşim İzidora'ya göndermeni istiyorum.
english: I want you to send this letter to my sister Izadora.
I'm going to the palace.
Father,
...the death of the man.

text: Kuşku dolu sorularıyla bir açığımı yakalamaya çalışıyor. Eleonora'nın attığı her adımdan haberim oldu.
english: He is trying to find an explanation with his doubtful questions. I know everything about Eleonora.
I did not do anything, Mario.
I am not going to let you go.
Gökçe. Mother Hayme Ertuğrul.

text: Surul'da gönlü var mı sor dedi.
english: Ask if he has a heart in Turul.

text: Sen de akıllan artık. Böyle kıyılara köşelere gizlenip kendini yemekten vazgeç.
english: You should be wise. Stop hiding in the middle of the river and eating your own food.
When I saw them together...

text: Demek gönlün var mı diye sordu.
english: So, he asked if you had a heart.
This is over.

text: Kaçmayacaksın. Her zaman olduğundan daha görünür olacaksın Ertugrul'un gözüne.
english: You will not run away. You will look more beautiful than you always have, Ertugrul.
Sister, Ertugrul's heart is with Halime.
You will see.
His mother asked me.
I know. My son does not want me.
My beautiful sister, my pure sister.

text: Ertuğrul'a soran kim? Süleyman Şah seni Gökçe ile evlendireceğim dedikten sonra......Ertuğrul itiraz edebilir mi sanıyorsun?
english: Who asked Ertugrul? After Suleyman Shah said he would marry you to Gokce......do you think Ertugrul would object?
He can't, right? Of course he can't.

text: Süleyman Şah'ın ağzından evlilik lafı bir kere çıktı mı......bu işi bitmiş bil.
english: Once Suleyman Shah says he wants to marry, it's over.

text: Hem sen Ertuğrul'un bugüne kadar baba sözünden çıktığını gördün mü hiç?
english: Have you ever seen Ertugrul's father's words come out?

text: Düğünün yakındır Gökçe kız. Böyle dertlenmeyi bırak. Gündoğdu Bey'imiz de dönsün hele. Ertuğrul'la sizi sözleriz.
english: Your wedding is near, Gokce. Stop worrying. Let Gundogdu Bey return home and we will make a promise with Ertugrul.
Do I have permission to come in, aunt?
Here, sir. Welcome.

text: Hoş bulduk. Bir halinizi hatırınızı sorayım dedim. İyisinizdir inşallah.
english: Thank you. I wanted to ask you about your condition. I hope you are fine.

text: Seni gördük daha iyi olduk Ertuğrul Bey.
english: It is better that we see you, Ertugrul Bey.
You have taken your homeland from Aleppo.
Thank God we did.

text: Ağabeyim dönsün kervanla. Göç ederiz artık. Sağ salim dönsün de.
english: Let my brother return to the caravan. We will move out. Let him return safely.
He will come back, God willing.
Come on.
Come on!
Come on.
Come on!
Fire!
Come on!
Come on.
Come on.
Come on.
Come on.

text: İyi de beyim bütün oba yeni yurt ister.
english: All right, my Bey. The whole tribe wants a new homeland.

text: Karakış kapıda. Halep'e göçmeyelim de nereye göçelim? Var mı bildiğin çıkar bir yol?
english: Karakis Kapı. Where else can we go if we don't go to Aleppo? Is there a way out?

text: Moğolların ordusu içinde kılıç çalan kaç Türkmen obası vardır, bilir misin sen Alpargu?
english: Do you know how many Turkmen tribes are there in the army of the Mongols?
No, I don't know. I know.

text: Ertuğrul'un aklına uyup tıkılacağımız yılan deliği yerine......geriye dönüp Moğol kumandanlarıyla anlaşabiliriz. Tapınakçıların kılıçlarına canımızı siper edip......Halep'in bekçi itimi olsun Kayılar!
english: Instead of following Ertugrul's plan and being fooled......we can go back and deal with the Mongol commanders. We can spare the lives of the Templars......and become the guard of Aleppo, Kayis!

text: Ya da onlarcasının yaptığı gibi koca Rum ülkesini baştan sona çapul niyetine heybemize mi dolduralım? Fakat beyim Moğollar defalarca girmediler mi kanımıza? Bu sefer farklı olacak işte!
english: Or should we fill the whole Greek country with our blood......like the many others did? But my Bey, haven't the Mongols entered our blood many times? This time it will be different.
...and for the safety of this tribe.

text: Şeytanla bile iş tutmayı göze almalıyız.
english: We must keep in touch with the devil.
Do not forget. Everything is for our tribe.
Now go...

text: Şu Baybora denen ayran budalası ile konuşun.
english: ...talk to that Ayran Budala called Baybora.

text: Dünkü bebenin aklını çelmesine de müsaade etme. Bugün ben susacağım, siz konuşacaksınız toyda.
english: Do not let the baby yesterday to be confused. I will keep quiet today and you will talk in the headquarters.
While Ertugrul was talking about his victory...
Shave it nicely.

text: Hem oba beylerinin de nabzını yoklamış oluruz.
english: We have also checked the men of the tribe.

text: Bakalım sizinle birlikte kaç kişinin sesi yükselecek?
english: Let's see how many people's voices will rise with you.
I'm going to the bathroom.
Come on.
Come on.
Go!
(Music)
No!
Stop! Karatoygar wants to live.
Take him away. TURKEY

text: Sana da yük alacağız İlyas bakar.
english: We'll be your first, Ilyas.

text: Yeni obamıza göç edene kadar idare edeceksin artık. Amma uzattınız ha. Şunca bir kere kılgın olup yatıvermişsiniz.
english: You'll be fine until you migrate to our new tribe. You've gone too far. You've been lying around all this time.

text: Başımın üstünde yeriniz var kardeşlerim. Turgut, Ertuğrul Bey'in benimle ne görüşecekmiş?
english: You have a lot of work to do, brothers. Turgut, what will Ertugrul Bey discuss with me?
I see you're spread out.

text: Sakın ola İlyas Fakih'i bunaltmayın. Derli toplu olun biraz.
english: Don't let Ilyas Fakih down. Get some rest, son.

text: Biz yokken obada olanları duymuşsundur. Eyvallah beyim. Turgut anlattı her şeyi.
english: You must have heard about what happened in the tribe when we were gone. Thank you, sir. Turgut told me everything.

text: Belli ki Kara Toygar'ın içeride bir adamı var. Biz yokken obayı basacak cesareti vermiş ona.
english: It is obvious that Kara Toygar has a man inside. He gave him the courage to take over the tribe when we were not there.
We need someone who will not draw attention.

text: Biz ne güne dururuz beyim? Sen şu cüsenle cani suratınla mı yapacaksın bu işi?
english: How can we stop, sir? Are you going to do this with that face?
Is there anyone who doubts my Bey?
Yes. Afsin.
The merchant's man?
He stayed in the tribe after saving Halime.
I want to know who he is.

text: Eyvallah beyim. Siz hiç merak buyurmayın. Nefesim ensesinde olacak.
english: Thank you, sir. Don't worry. He will be in my office.
(Music)
I'm sorry.
(Music)
I came to ask for your permission sir.
It's time to go.
I'll finish the job I left tomorrow.
I will handle this matter quietly.

text: İçinden nazlı bir bebek gibi büyüdü intikamını.
english: You grew up like a baby with a fever inside.

text: Ama asla görevlerinin önüne geçmesine izin verme.
english: But never let them get ahead of their duties.
May the Turks prevent us from reaching our limits.
The King of the world is here.
Who says be, be.
The one who fills our hearts with faith...
With the 99 names of God Almighty...
In the name of God.
You are the one who should speak, Ertugrul.

text: Yeni yurdumuz atalarımızın destanlarında anlattıkları efsanevi topraklara benziyor.
english: Our new homeland resembles the legendary lands......that our ancestors described in their manuscripts.
He is as protective as he is.
...and surrounded by mountains.

text: Çevre hali Yelkesen diye isim dahi takmış mevkiye.
english: He even named the place after the people of the surrounding area.
Then, if you squeeze the stone, water will flow.

text: Öylesine bereketli ve münbit bir yer.
english: It is a blessed and blessed place.

text: Kaylarımızın özgürce koşacağı, kışın ayazından kırılan hayvanlarımızın......semireceği bir dünya cenneti. Allah razı olsun.
english: A world paradise where our Kayis will run freely......and our animals will enjoy the winter sun. God is the greatest.
Thank you.

text: Yurdu aldık diye her şey güllük gülistanlık değil elbet. Yeni menzilimiz toprağa bereketli ama düşmanı da bir o kadar yaman bir yer.
english: We bought the homeland, of course, not because of our pride. Our new position is fertile but our enemy is also a very poor place.
There is a cross at the bottom of our nose.

text: Çocuklarımız ve sürülerimiz büyürken......etrafımızdaki fitne ateşi de büyüyecek.
english: While our children and our herd are growing......the fire of slander will grow around us.
If that's the case...

text: Neden bize atadan dededen kalma masallar anlatıp aklımızı bulandırırsın Ertuğrul Bey? Evet Alpargu haklı. Evet haklı. Doğru der.
english: Why do you tell us stories about our ancestors and make us confused, Ertugrul Bey? Yes, Alpargu is right. Yes, he is. He is right.
We want a home, not a grave.
The one who makes the land his home...
It is a grave, Baybora.
May our graves be our land.
and our homeland.

text: Deli Demir doğrudan. Evet doğrudan. Doğrudan.
english: Deli Demir, right turn. Yes, right turn.
You are wrong, Alpargu Bey.
Do you think our ancestors' legends are fairy tales?

text: Onlar bebeği uyutmak için değil adamı uyandırmak içindir.
english: They are not for the baby, but to wake the man up.

text: Biz onlardan bereketli toprakları da öğrendik. Etrafını saran demir dağları eritmeyi de.
english: We learned about the fertile lands from them... and the iron mountains surrounding them.
What do you think, Kurdoglu?
Ertugrul is right, my Bey.

text: Düşmanımızın varlığı bize gazi olmanın, şehit olmanın kapısını açar elhamdülillah.
english: The presence of our enemy opens the door to us becoming martyrs.
It will strengthen our tribe. We will collect treasure.
Is there anyone who opposes?
Since everyone agrees...
Then, let the preparation for migration begin.
I'm here.
Come here, Gundogdu.
I am furious.
To me or to your father?
I don't like the red sherbet, Karato.
I'm sorry.

text: Aslında bu olanlara hiç gerek yok Gül.
english: Actually, these things are not necessary.
God bless you.

text: Yarın öbür gün ihtiyar babanın başına bir halt gelse.
english: If a horde of old men comes to the head of the old man the next day...
...to be replaced.
It would be better for the Kayis.

text: Eğer ben bir gün bey olursam...
english: If I become a Bey one day...
...will make you suffer.
He makes dogs eat his flesh.
Oh God!
When I came to the tribe...
I thought Ertugrul was a traitor.

text: Asıl cevval olan dişini göstermeyen öteki enikmiş.
english: The real Cevval is the other female who doesn't show her teeth.
Bring him in.
Hamza?

text: Babana son bir fırsat vereceğim Gündoğdu. Alpin Hamza'yı...
english: I will give your father one last chance, Gundogdu. I will make sure that...
I will send it to your father.

text: Yarın tek başına esirleri bana getirmesini kibarca teklif edeceğim.
english: Tomorrow, I will offer him to bring the prisoners to me alone.
...if you do not accept my offer.

text: Önce seni sonra bütün kıyıları kılıcıdan geçireceğim. İyi niyetli.
english: First I will kill you, then I will kill all the Kylis. Be good.

text: ...temiz kalpli bir komutanın yapabileceği ne varsa.
english: ...what a clean hearted commander can do.
I will do it. I can do it.

text: ...bu kadar gelir. Beni anlıyor musun he?
english: That's all I can say. Do you understand me?
Oh!
Take them away, you bastard!
Come on.
(Music)
(Music)
I'm sorry.
The arrow you call a runaway...
The eyelashes are like a arrow.

text: Öyle bir bakacaksın ki erine, kalbinden vuracaksın.
english: You will look at your husband and shoot him in the heart.
He will not see anyone but you.

text: Çok sürme. Ben de yaralanmış gibi gözükmeyeyim. Merak etme.
english: Do not be so angry. I do not want to look like I am wounded. Do not worry.

text: Çok güzel olacaksın. Bir bey hatunu gibi.
english: You will be beautiful. Like a Bey Hatun.
With your hair...
with your apple cheeks...
You will be in pain all night.

text: Herkes sana bakacak ama en çok da Ertuğrul.
english: Everyone will look at you, but mostly Ertugrul.
Will you look at me Sahi?
He will.
What are you talking about?
He will be struck by your heart and hear seven worlds.
My children, time is of the essence.
I mean...

text: Biz daha ata topraklarından buralara göçmeden...
english: We have not migrated from our homeland...
It's been a long time.
...who killed our people...

text: Sürülere dalıp atları, yılkı atlarını parçalayıp yiyen melun mu melun bir ejderha var.
english: There is a dragon who dives into the flocks and eats the horses......and the horses of the herds.
People are so scared...

text: Durup yok mu bizi bu ejderhadan kurtaracak bir yiğit de?
english: Is there no brave man who can save us from this dragon?
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
Come on.
(Music)
My Oghuz father said go!

text: Var. Tabii o benim gibi değil. Daha yiğit.
english: Yes. I'm a man.
And the broadcast...

text: okunu, kargısını, kılıcını aldığı gibi düşmüş yola.
english: He fell to the ground as if he had taken his sword and his sword.
You know your job.
(Music)
(Music)
Don't be a stranger.
Say hello to Ertugrul.

text: Beyim, Allah razı olsun senden. Sayende telef olmadık soğuklarda. Koç yiğitlerin hep böyle ardına düşe. Kızınla oba kurasın, oğlunla ordu olasın. Allah senden razı olsun. Başımızda kalmayacak.
english: My Bey, may God bless you. We didn't get a phone call because of you. May the brave men always follow you. May you build a tribe with your daughter and an army with your son. May God bless you.
Amen.

text: Baksana bizim hisli tekiye. Kilitlenip kaldı yine.
english: Look at our stronghold. It's locked again.
(Music)

text: Oğuz Hatam dikilmiş ejderhanın karşısına bana bak demiş bana!
english: Oghuz Hatam, look at the dragon!

text: Bu kılıçla sana öyle bir vururum ki...
english: I will hit you so hard that...
...the biggest piece of yours.
...in your ears.
I'm going to the market.
Come on.
To our new home...
May the Alps play sword and shield.
Let's make them pay for what they did.
(Music)
(Music)
Come on.
(Music)
Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
(Music)
(Music)
Hey!
(Music)
(Music)
Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

text: Süleyman Şah töredir diye sahip çıktı size.
english: Suleyman Shah came to you because he was a Töre.
That's how it is with us.
What about you?

text: Misafir olunan yerde, Beyoğlu'na göz kaş süzüp ayartmak mı vardır?
english: Do you have to look after your son and make him sleep......when you are visiting him?
What are you talking about?

text: Ben diyeceğimi dedim, sen de anladın.
english: I said what I had to say and you understood.
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
No!

text: Ertuğrul'dan uzak dur. Ertuğrul'dan uzak dur.
english: Stay away from Ertugrul.
Halime.
You look like you were cast out of the broadcast.

text: Yoksa yine obadan kaçmaya mı niyetlisin?
english: Or are you going to run away from the tribe?
You must have heard about them.
Yes, we tried to escape.

text: Ama kaçamadık maalesef. Kimse gitmenizi istemiyor.
english: But unfortunately, we could not escape. No one wants you to go.
Our guest is holy.
This is our custom.
Artur Bey.
We carry the Black Clouds on us.

text: Gidelim ki obanın üstüne kara bulutlar dağılsın. Demek ben Halep'ten döndüğümde gitmiş olacaktınız öyle mi?
english: Let's go so that the dark clouds fall on the tribe. So you were going to go when I returned from Aleppo, right?
You will be the one to step into the secret.
My heart was going to burn.
My heart was going to be shattered.

text: Bunlar bizim peşimizi asla bırakmayacak Ertuğrul. Kim onlar Halime?
english: They will never leave us alone, Ertugrul. Who are they, Halime?
What do they want from you?

text: Bizim kim olduğumuzu hiç bilmesen daha iyi Ertuğrul.
english: It is better if you do not know who we are, Ertugrul.

text: Beyim cüzdanlı birini yakaladık. Gelin, gelin.
english: My Bey, we caught one of the prisoners. He is coming.
(Music)

text: Yaşatmayın bunu öldürün! Kimsin kadın? Beyim yemek kazanlarına bir şey dökerken yakaladık bu kadını. Ecele mi susadın?
english: Don't let her live! Kill her! Who are you, woman? Sir, we caught this woman while we were pouring something into their food pots.
(Music)
Why did you pour it into the pot?

text: Sana tapınak şövalyelerinden selam getirdim Ertuğrul. Allah'a emanet olun.
english: I brought you greetings from the Knights of the Temple, Ertugrul.

text: Kazanlar ve bu kadını bir çukura koyun.
english: Put the pot and this woman in a pit.
Come on.
What do these Templars want from you?

text: Halep'te seni öldürmeye çalıştıklarını daha bu sabah anlatmışken......gecesinde bütün melanetlerini obamıza yaymaya çalışırlar.
english: While they told us this morning that they were trying to kill you in Aleppo......they are trying to spread their slander to our tribe at night.

text: Her şey senin şu misafir aileyi onların elinden kurtarmanla başladı. Bu ne iştir?
english: It all started with you saving that guest family from them. What is this?
It is deeper than it seems, father.

text: Zannetmem ki konu sadece Halimelerle alakalı olsun.
english: I don't think it is only about Halime.

text: Tapınakçıların esas saldırma sebebi......haçlıların dibinde yurt tutmamızdan olsa gerek.
english: The main reason for the Templars' attack......must be the fact that we have a home at the bottom of the Crusaders.
You cannot fool them.

text: Ama misafirlerimizin bizden gizlediği bir sır var.
english: But our guests have a secret that they are hiding from us.
And this secret...
A dangerous secret.
Of course, they are our guests.
He is the crown of our head.
But there is no other way, Ertugrul.
Dad.
Ertugrul.

text: Evladım, yabanın kızından obanın kızı olmaz.
english: My son, a tribe's daughter is not the daughter of a wild one.
Don't think about that.

text: Hem seni tez vakitte Gökçe kızımızla baş göz etmek isteriz.
english: Besides, we want to see you with our daughter Gokce as soon as possible.

text: Haymanan'la konuştuk. Ben de münasip gördüm.
english: We talked to mother Hayme, I thought she was right.

text: Neyse. Gündüzün şerri, gecenin hayrından yeğedir.
english: Anyway... The evil of day is worse than the good of night.
Come to your work in the morning.
Then we will talk.
Come on.
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
What is it that makes you go to the dungeon at night, son?

text: Ana, babam ne der? Gökçe bacım bana yar olacakmış.
english: Mother, what does my father say? Sister Gokce will be my lover.
Come on.
Gokce is Bey's daughter.
...is in our tent.
Sleep, sleep.
We know your family background.
You know that, mother.
Do you know my heart?
Halime......is here today, but she is not here tomorrow.
We do not know who they are.
They call us merchants.
Your father won't say a word.
But he knows...
They are not merchants either.
He says that they are the guests of God.
Where does the end go?
He does not allow it.
The word of the father.
If the safety of your tribe is important to you...

text: Gökçe der başka bir şey demez.
english: Gokce, she is the best.

text: Ana......Hakçalığımın bir ceylanla çıkardı onu karşıma.
english: Mother, I saw him with a jaylan from Hakcalp.
How can I hide those beautiful eyes?
...to those sweet tongues.

text: Bir gün cesaret eder de sorarsam.
english: If I ask you, you would be brave enough to do it.
...to see if you have a heart.

text: O da yolum senin yolundur derse...
english: If he says that my path is yours...
How can I tell her, mother?
I'm sorry.
I am not a child anymore.
I'm going to the hospital.
(Music)
(Music)
Come on.
Are you sleeping?
So that my eyes can close for a moment.
He won't give anything.
I talked to Ertugrul.
My daughter's father is better.
They leave without moving.
My Bey. I called you Gokce.
But I am not at ease.
Ertugrul's other daughter has a heart.

text: Alp'in gönlü obasının izinine gider Hayme.
english: Alps' soul goes to the tribe's will.
He's young.
He is a young man.
My heart is pounding.
...and when I was in the tent...
and the one in your heart will be proud.
Come on, may God give you peace.
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)

text: Ne kutlu bir sabah bu böyle. Hadi artık. Ferah tut gönlünü. Sevin sevinebilirsin.
english: What a happy morning. Come on, relax. You can be happy.
I'm sorry.

text: Süleyman Bey'imiz de söylemiş işte Ertuğrul'a sizi evlendireceğini.
english: Suleyman Bey told Ertugrul that he would marry you.
I don't know, sister.

text: Böyle içimde kelebekler uçuşuyor ama......öte yandan da bir kara bulut hiç gitmiyor sanki.
english: I feel like butterflies flying in my veins but there is no black cloud in the other side.

text: Bir oy çek, at bütün kötülükleri üzerinden. Tamamdır bu iş. Gündoğdu dönsün hele, kayıta iş yok artık.
english: Just get rid of all the bad things. It's done. As long as Gundogdu is alive, there is no turning back.
Isn't Ertugrul here?
He is not here, my Bey. He is in his tent. Please.
Gokce.

text: Git haberi ver. Sabah işine gelsin.
english: Go and inform him. Let him come to work tomorrow.
(Music)
Come on, my dear.
Mr. Ertugrul.
Come, Gokce. Suleyman.

text: O zaman Şahım seni sabah açısına bekler Ertuğrul Bey.
english: Then, my Shah will wait for you in the morning,
(Music)
Sister Gokce.
He's coming.
Come on.
I am going to the bathroom.
The deal is final.
We will give the land as many soldiers as we want.
We will pay the taxes.
We accept the land you show.

text: Yarın sabah tez vakitte yola çık. Selamlarımı ilet.
english: Tomorrow morning, come to the road as soon as possible. Send my regards.

text: Yeni yurdumuza yerleştiğimizde kendisini ziyaret edeceğini bildiriver.
english: When we settle in our new homeland, inform him that I will visit him.
It is important.
I am glad that we settled in our new home.
Thank you.
We will have a wedding with Gokce.
I want a grandson, Ertugrul.
(Music)
Father. If you'll excuse me.
Get up and bring some water. Our Bey...
Wait, let me tell our Bey.

text: Rahman kimdir o gelen? Hamza geldi beyim. Size görüşmek ister. Gelsin hemen.
english: Rahman, who is that man? He came to the tent, my Bey. He wants to see you. Let him in.
I hope nothing happens to him.
My Bey. Kara Toygar.

text: Kara Toygar kervana bastı. Kara Toygar mı? Ne diyorsun sen be adam? Gündoğdu nerede? Diğer alplerim nerede?
english: Kara Toygar pushed the caravan. Kara Toygar? What are you talking about? Where is Gundogdu? Where are my other Alps?
They're all dead, sir.

text: Hepsi. Gündoğdu Bey'imizi de Kara Toygar esir aldı. Esir aldı ne demek? Sen nasıl bırakırsın beni ha? Nasıl?
english: All of them. Gundogdu took our Bey as a prisoner. What do you mean? How could you leave your Bey? How?

text: Sen nasıl bırakıyorsun? Ne istermiş bu Kara Toygar denilen yılan?
english: How did you let him go? What does this snake called Kara Toygar want?
I brought Ertugrul Bey, my ambassador.
Kara Toygar wants them.
If you don't give it tomorrow...
They will kill Gundogdu Bey.

text: Sen sebep oldun bunlara. Hepsi senin yüzünden. O Allah'ın belalarını getirdin buraya. Başımıza gelmeyen hiç kalmadı. Selcan!
english: You caused all this! It's all because of you! You brought all the troubles of God here. We have nothing left to worry about! Selcan!

text: Selcan gel. Gel kızım. Gel. Rahma.
english: Selcan, come. Come, my girl. Come.

text: Güvendiğin adamları gönder, cenazelerimizi alıp getirsinler. Hamza'yı da kimseye göstermeden bir çadıra götür.
english: Send the men you trust to take our bodies. Take Hamza to a tent without showing anyone.

text: Akçakoca ilgilensin. Olanı biteni obada kimsenin bilmesini istemiyorum.
english: Let Akcakoca take care of it. I don't want anyone in the tribe to know what happened.

text: Bana da Numan'ı getir! Ne dersin beyim?
english: Bring me Numan, too. Yes, sir.
Ertugrul.

text: Sen ne destur üstadamsın be? Böyle girilir mi elin çadırına? Halime.
english: What kind of a boss are you? Don't you get into my tent like this? Halime.
Suleyman Shah is waiting for you in his tent.
Hurry up.
Come on, hurry up.
Numan Efendi.

text: Hayırdır? Merak etme Afşin bir şey yok.
english: What is it? Do not worry, Afsin. It is nothing.

text: Baba? Baba? Halime babacığım, şehzademleri nereye götürüyorlar?
english: Father? Father? Halime, where is my Shahzada taking them?
(Music)
Suleyman Shah wanted to see you.
I'm sorry.

text: Bunun böyle olacağını biliyordum ben. Başımıza bunların geleceğini biliyordum.
english: I knew this would happen. I knew this would happen to us.

text: Eğer Gündoğdu'nun kılına zarar gelirse o kızın da ailesinin de canını alırım.
english: If Gundogdu's head gets hurt, I will kill that girl and her family.
Stop, my dear, stop!

text: Bey hatununa metanetli olmak yakışır. Topla kendini.
english: ...is to be obedient to your wife. Get yourself together...
I'm sorry.
Please, my Bey. Do not call me.
This way.
A informant came this morning.
...and give me a caravan...
I informed them that the Alps were killed.
Kara Toygar who did this...
My son has captured Gundogdu.
My Bey. What is the test called? I do not know.
God bless you.
May God bless you.
I didn't call you here to report your accusations.
I am sorry for calling you here...

text: Oğlum rehin tutan eşkıyaların benden ne istediklerini anlamışsındır.
english: You must have understood what the bandits who captured my son wanted from me.

text: Şimdi sana tek bir soru soracağım.
english: I will ask you one question.

text: Ve karşılığında senden tek bir cevap istiyorum.
english: And I want only one answer from you.
Who are you?

text: Bir yanda kocam, bir yanda bu ne ödüğü bilirsizlerin canı!
english: My husband and the people who don't know what he's doing!

text: Onca Alp'i öldürdüler. Gündoğdu'yu esir aldılar.
english: They killed so many Alps. They took Gundogdu prisoner.

text: Lakin sana söylüyorum. Bunların bizden sakladığı bir şey var. Ama ben onu öğreneceğim. Sonra da bunun hesabını soracağım. Yeri dağlar töreyi beyler tutar kızım.
english: But I'm telling you, there is something that they are hiding from us. But I will find out and then I will ask for the account of this. The mountains hold the customs, my dear.
That is the job of the men you are talking about.

text: Bunların muslubetleri yüzünden obada el mi kaldı bey ana?
english: Are they still alive because of their sins, mother?

text: Git şunun peşinden. Daha çok ortalığı karıştırmasın.
english: Go after him. Don't let him get in the way.

text: Beyim size bunu söylemek boylamamın borcudur fakat...
english: My Bey... It is my duty to tell you this, but...
Make sure...
I am as worried as my own safety.
I will be as good as my family's security.
I am concerned about your safety.
My Bey, if I tell you who we are...
The disasters you have experienced today...

text: Emin olun şimdikinden kat ve kat fazla olacaktır.
english: I am sure that he will be more and more than he is now.
But......I owe you a life.
I am ready for any sacrifice for you.
I don't want to...

text: Evlatırımın canı dahildir. Sana tek bir cevap dedim. Tek bir cevap!
english: ...my son's life. I said one answer! One answer!
I......am a member of the great Seljuk dynasty...
...Muzafferuddin Davut.
Muhyiddin, son of Mesud Shah.
Sultan Ezettin...
The grandson of the sword lion.
I am the Prince of Seljuk.
(Music)

text: Halime! İyice işit beni. Buraya geldiğin güne lanet edeceksin.
english: Halime! Listen to me! You will curse me the day you come here.

text: Sen ki her ne yaşattın bu obaya misli misli ödeyeceksin.
english: You will pay for everything you have done for this tribe.

text: Anladın mı şimdi beni? Eğer iş bana düşerse gözümü kırpmadan eceliniz olurum sizin. Eceliniz!
english: Do you understand? If I get into trouble, I will kill you before I can even blink.
Slow down, Hatun.
You attack me like a wolf.

text: Sizin yüzünüzden kervanımız basıldı. Yiğitlerimiz öldürüldü.
english: Our caravan was raided because of you. Our brave men were killed.

text: Kara Toygar denen namussuz kocamı esir aldı. Hele onun kılına bir zarar gelsin. Hele benim canım bir yansın. Sen kudurmak neymiş o zaman göreceksin. Abla!
english: ...he took my dishonest husband, Kara Toygar, hostage! Let him suffer a loss......let my life burn in hell......then you will see what it is to be a widow! Sister!

text: Tamam. Hadi gidelim. Biz gitmeyeceğiz Gökçe. Onlar gidecek.
english: Okay. Let us go. We will not go, Gokce. They will go.
...or I will die.
They will hide! Selcan!
Get out of here.
I will be back soon.
(Music)
I'll give you a hand.
Don't tell anyone about this.
Stay in the tent.
Because I do not know what will happen...
None of us know.
(Music)
Do I have permission to come in, sister Halime?
I heard them all.
This is not good.
What are we going to do, Afsin Bey?

text: Gelini gelip kocasına bir şey olursa bizi öldürmekle tehdit etti.
english: If something happens to her husband, she threatened to kill us.
We'll find a solution.
It is obvious that Suleyman Shah...
The funeral will hide me.
If we hear anything...

text: Ahalinin ne yapacağı hiç belli olmaz. Allah korusun.
english: It's not clear what the people will do. God forbid.

text: Ne şehzadelerimize bir şey olsun ne de Gündoğdu'ya.
english: I don't care about the Shahzadas or Gundogdu.
Kara Toygan's intention is clear
In return for Gundogdu...
He will ask for our Shahzadas.

text: Siz çadırdan çıkmayın. Ben ne gerekiyorsa yapacağım.
english: Don't leave the tent. I'll do whatever I need to.
If you excuse me.
I have been running away for years.
We are tired, my Bey.

text: Benim varlığımı devletimi tehdit edenlerden kaçtım.
english: I ran away from those who threatened my state and my existence.
From the Templars.
I escaped from the Mongols and their curiosity to make you happy.
I will not be able to save my country...
My dear son.

text: Yiğidime zarar gelmesin diye de devletimden kaçtım.
english: I ran away from my state so that my Yigit would not be harmed.

text: Beyim, ben kendi canımdan vazgeçeli çok oldum.
english: My Bey, I gave up my life for so long.
...to be here.

text: Artık bu işe bir son vermenin zamanı geldi.
english: It is time to end this business.
Kara Toygar wants a bet, father.
But even if we give him what you want...
He will kill you anyway.

text: Şehzadeler alınca sana olan öfkesi bitmeyecek.
english: When the Shahzadas take him, your anger will not end.
He will kill you and my brother.
You are right, son.

text: Önce, Gündoğdu'yu onun elinden kurtarmanın bir yolunu bulmalıyız.
english: First we must find a way to save Gundogdu from him.
Not just my brother.

text: Seni de ona teslim etmem baba.
english: I won't hand you over to him either, father.
If I were to go against my enemies...
...won't let Gundogdu live.

text: Hem dökülecek kanla oba bir daha iflah etmez.
english: And the tribe won't be saved with the blood that will be spilled.
We will be destroyed.

text: İlk önce ağabeyimi serbest bırakmaya onu ikna etmelisin baba.
english: First, you must persuade my brother to release me.
Then, he will be sent out of the headquarters.
Since he wants a bet...

text: Kuralları biz belirleyeceğiz. Gündoğdu'yu niye bıraksın ki? Bırakmak zorunda baba.
english: We will set the rules. Why should he leave Gundogdu? He has to, father.

text: Tapınakçılar beni Halep'te neden öldürmeye kalktı?
english: Why did the Templars kill me in Aleppo?

text: Neden obayı zehirlemek için cüzdanlı bir kadın yolladılar?
english: Why did they send a woman with a wallet to poison the tribe?

text: Neden tapınakçılar şehzadeleri Kara Toygar'a götürüyorlardı? Tapınakçılar...
english: Why were the Templars taking the Shahzadas to Karatoygar? The Templars...

text: Kara Toygar'ın sarayda önemli bir mevki elde etmesini istiyor vardı. Onlara hizmet etmesini. Kara Toygar'ın asıl istediği şehzadeler baba.
english: Kara Toygar wanted him to have an important position in the palace. To serve them. The princes Kara Toygar wanted, father.
He does everything for them.
As long as we know how to ask for it.
If it is not as you say...
Then we all die, father.

text: Ama en azından elimizde kılıcımız, onurumuzla ölürüz.
english: But at least we have our swords and honor.
(Music)
Are they all dead?
Unfortunately it has to be like that.
They will all die except Gundogdu.
Maybe someone lucky...
Bad news...
...will bring it to Suleyman Shah.

text: Vay canına! Süleyman Şah'ın saltanatı bitecek.
english: Wow! Suleyman Shah's reign will end.
He went to the big world.
Good.
What if he says it's a custom?

text: Esirleri vermezse? Vermeyip de ne yapacak?
english: What if he doesn't give the prisoners? What will he do if he doesn't?
Will he say amen to the death of his son?

text: Alplerini toplayıp Kara Toygar'a saldırırsa ne yapacağız?
english: What will we do if he gathers his Alps and attacks Kara Toygar?
...you know Suleyman Shah well.
He will show his true colors.

text: Kara Toygar ikisini de ortadan kaldıracak.
english: Kara Toygar will get rid of them both.
There is only Ertugrul left.
And...
You went too far, sir. Too far.

text: Bu işin sonu hiç iyi değil.
english: This is not the end.

text: Ulan it! Madem bu kadar korkuyordun, niye benimle birlik oldun?
english: You idiot! If you were so scared, why did you come with me?

text: Obanın düze çıkması için beyim. Bu işin buraya varacağını... Neye varacak ha? Neye varacak?
english: I'm doing this to make the tribe stand up, sir. What will you do? What will you do?

text: Bu obanın iyiliği için üç beş alp feda edilecekse edilir. Edilmez mi ha? Söyle bana edilmez mi?
english: If three or five Alps are sacrificed for the good of this tribe, they will be sacrificed. Won't they be sacrificed? Tell me, won't they be sacrificed?
...I can't, sir.
...will be destroyed.

text: Allah hepsine gani gani rahmet eylesin.
english: May God bless them all.
We did what was necessary.

text: Eğer Kara Toygar'ı kervan baskınına ikna etmeseydim...
english: If I didn't convince Kara Toygar to the caravan raid...
He would have been on our side with his army. He would have made our Suleyman a slave.

text: Şimdi tek yapmamız gereken şey arkamıza yaslanıp...
english: Now, all we have to do is to get behind us...
Waiting for the news of the black news to fall on the tribe.

text: Sen de git elin yüzünü yıka. Kendine gel hadi.
english: Go wash your hands. Get yourself together.
I'm not going to let you go.
Be careful with this fear Alpargu.

text: Eğer korkusu diline vuracak olursa, kökünden koparmaktan da çekinme.
english: If your fear will be enough, do not hesitate to break your bones.
Everything will be fine, sister. You will see.
Suleyman Shah would not sacrifice his son.
If he doesn't say goodbye...
Of course not.
But he never breaks his tradition.

text: Abla, Allah aşkına olmayacak şeyler düşünüp kendini perişan etme.
english: Sister, for God's sake, don't think about things that won't happen and get upset.

text: ...Gündoğdu'yu Kara Toygar'ın elinden kurtarmak için bir delilik yaparsa......içimi kemiren bu Gökçe...
english: If you do something to save Gundogdu from Kara Toygar......this Gokce who is making me mad...
I will go and talk to Suleyman Shah.
First, he will release Gundogdu.

text: Sonra Kara Toygar'ı istediğimiz yere getirmek için yola çıkaracağım.
english: Then I will set off to bring Kara Tolgar to the place we want.
When we get to the place we will go to...

text: Gerisi artık sizin cesaret ve hünerinize kalacak evlat.
english: The rest will depend on your courage and courage, son.

text: Büyüğün bir mesele konuşulmakta Selcan Hatun. Çekil önümden.
english: There is a big matter to be discussed, Selcan Hatun. Get out of my way.
As our Bey ordered...
I told you to get out of my sight!

text: Kara Toygar'ı Kartal Tepesi'ne tuzağa düşüreceğiz.
english: We will trap Kara Toygar at Kartal Hill.
(Music)
Come, let's talk outside.

text: Gündoğdu ağabeyimi sana sağ salim getireceğime dair söz veriyorum. Eğer Gündoğdu'ma bir şey olursa...
english: I promise to bring my brother Gundogdu back to you safely. If anything happens to my Gundogdu...

text: Eğer ağabeyini yolda bulduklarına feda edersen......iki elim yakanda olur Ertuğrul.
english: If you sacrifice your brother for what he found on the road... I will be in your debt, Ertugrul.
My Bey, as a father...
I have one last request.
If you allow me...
Tell my daughter to you, Bekir.
Kara Toygar...
My son is after me.
My daughter is fine.
My daughter is the daughter of the tribe now.
Who is he?
Take it.
Keep my heart at ease, sister.
(Music)

text: Dur! Ne istiyorsun? Bir otak başını soracaktım.
english: Stop! What do you want? I was going to ask the head of the tent.
He was once the head of the tribe.
Who are you looking for?
They call it yellow beards.
We know the yellow bear of course.

text: Ama artık kendisi otak başı değil, bölük başı oldu.
english: But now he is not a head of the headquarters anymore, he is a head of the
I'm at the station.

text: Kara Toygar'la göreve gitti. Bir diyeceğin varsa bize de. Var. Var yiğidim var.
english: He went to work with Kara Toygar. If you have anything to say to us. I have. I have, Yigit, I have.
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
Welcome, Titus.

text: Geç otur. Üstadın güvercinle gönderdiği mektubu okudum.
english: Sit down. Read the letter your master sent with the pigeon.
I do not want the Kayis to migrate to Aleppo.
Yes.
Do not worry.
The Kayis are not in Aleppo...

text: Benim istediğim yere göç edecekler. Nasıl?
english: They will move to the place I want. How?
The future Beys will think the same way I do.
If we are to walk on the feet of the Crusaders...
...is to sit at the bottom of the Mongol's lap.
Who is this man?
I did.
...Suleyman Shah's blood brother.
Come on.
You are a stubborn fool.
...will not be out of our hands.
Someone we can use as we want.
Yasuleyman Shah..
Suleyman Shah.
When evening comes...
...to my headquarters...
...will surrender.
Moreover...

text: Şövalyelerinin elinden kaçırdığı şehzadeleri de yanında getireceğim.
english: I will bring the Shahzadas that the knights have lost.
Come on.
Afsin Bey!
I thought he was dead. It is not necessary to know.
He was looking
Our state is under great threat.
I need your help.
I'm sorry.
(Music)
Where is this ominous news?

text: Beyim, Süleyman Şah'ım sizi otağında bekler.
english: My Bey, Suleyman Shah is waiting for you in his tent.
Whatever it is...
The Shahzadas should not be taken by Kara Toygar.

text: Ya Sultan Alaaddin'e şehzadeleri götürmeyi başarırsa?
english: If Sultan Alahaddin manages to take the Shahzadas...
Aladdin's
He'll be your commander.
The Templars keep Konya in check.

text: Devletin içinde cirit atarlar. Bunun vebali büyük olur Sarı.
english: They throw a fit in the government. This will lead to a big disaster.
We didn't establish this state easily.
If necessary,
We won't hesitate to kill the Shahzadas.

text: Benden ne istiyorsanız yapmaya hazırım beyim.
english: I'm ready to do whatever you want, my Bey.
Alright, I know, Sara.
What a cruel Karatoygar!
How could he kill our warriors?

text: Üstüne üstlük, Gündoğdu'yu da esir etmiş ha.
english: And he imprisoned Gundogdu.
Yes.

text: Şimdi misafirleri teslim etme mi bekliyorlar?
english: Now they are waiting for me to deliver the guests.

text: Öyleyse bu kuduz itin eceli bizim elimizden olacak.
english: Then we will kill this Kuduz dog.

text: Varalım alplerimizle gidelim, dünyayı başlarına geçirelim.
english: Let's go with our Alps and take the world under their wing.
No. I will go alone.
I won't leave you alone.

text: Biz birimiz ölüme giderken öteki ardından baksın......avratlar gibi gözyaşı döksün diye mi kan kardeş olduk zamanında beyim?
english: We became blood brothers when we were......their blood brothers, so that they would look after the other......and shed tears like women, my Bey.

text: Benim çıkacağım yolun akıbeti meçhul Kurdoğlu.
english: The end of my journey is unknown, Kurdoglu.
When I feel bad...
...to the tribe I left behind...

text: Kan kardeşim kol kanat gerdiğini bilmezsem gözüm açık gitmez mi?
english: If I didn't know that my blood brother was a bandit, wouldn't I be blind?
I was a soldier when I was gone.
You are right.
Come, put this on.
Do not get lost.
Sister. Yes, Asli?
What if I don't see you again?
I'm not a slave.
We have been through so much together.
What difficulties have we faced?
We will overcome this, of course.

text: Ama bu defa ayrılıyoruz ve yanımızda sen yoksun. Ya adamlar bizi alır? Sen hiç yüreğini böyle dertlerle sıkma olur mu aslan kardeşim?
english: But this time we are leaving and you are not with us. What if those men take us? Don't ever worry about such things, my brother.

text: Bak bu defa yalnız değiliz. Obanın beyleri var. Onlar bizim canımızı korurlar, bize sahip çıkarlar.
english: Look, this time we are not alone. The Beys of the tribe are here. They protect us, they take care of us.

text: Sen babamın yanından ayrılma. Onun sözünden çıkma yeter olur mu?
english: Do not leave my father. It is enough to keep his word.
Don't even think about me.
I will sit here and wait for you.
Don't be upset, okay?
Come on. Now go.
Don't touch your friends.
Come on.
Father. Do not be afraid, Yigit.
I'm telling you so you don't get upset.
I can't believe it, father.
What will happen?
My dear... It has been a long time.

text: Kaçarak, tutsak düşerek çok çileler çektik.
english: We ran away, we were trapped and suffered a lot.

text: Bu iş bu defa bitecek inşallah.
english: This will be over this time.
Ertugrul has an idea.
I also have it in my mind.

text: Tez zamanda sağ salim gidip geri döneceğiz Allah'ın izniyle.
english: We will be back soon, with God's permission.

text: Bu baba bizim için o kadar ağır bedeller ödedi ki.
english: This father paid such a heavy price for us...

text: Ne yapsak hasta haklarını ödeyemeyiz baba.
english: We cannot pay for what we did, father.
But father, please let me.

text: İzin ver ben de sizinle geleyim.
english: Let me come with you.

text: Ne olacaksa olsun hayır ya da şer.
english: Whatever happens, be it good or bad...
May we end up together.

text: Sen bizim için dua et yeter kızım.
english: You just pray for us daughter.
Good.
Take care.
My brave daughter.
Like mother...
...sacrificed.
...in the name of God.
My beautiful daughter.
Don't worry.
Everything will be fine.
What do you want?
We'll go down.
I'm going to the hospital.

text: Sırtıma saplanmış bıçak gibi canımı yakar bıçıma.
english: I am so tired of this.
I am sorry.
I am in pain.
I may not be able to do anything.

text: Evlatlarım ve senin için dua etmekten başka bir şey yapamıyorum. Biz ne acılar çektik.
english: I cannot do anything but pray for my children and you. We suffered a lot.
We have neither seen any refugees nor wars.
My husband is also lucky.

text: Şükürler ola ki bugünlere kadar gelebildik Hayme'm. Gördük ya beyim.
english: Thank God we were able to come here today, Hayme. We saw it, my Bey.

text: Ne düğünler, ne yeni bebeler, ne baharlar.
english: No weddings, no new babies, no spring.
We saw victories.
I hope we will see each other again.
Give me your blessing.
What a pain.
What a life, my Bey.
You are on the right path.
You did not bend and bend.
Did you see that the one who was walking on the right path is missing?
If God permits.
I will see you and my children back.
May God help you.
God bless you.
Thank you.
What do you want?

text: Nereden geldin nereye gidersin Afşin bey?
english: Where are you coming from, Afsin Bey?

text: İn misin cin misin bir senden duymak istedim.
english: I wanted to hear if you were a man or a woman.
(Music)
(Music)
I'm sorry.
(Music)
I'm sorry.

text: Allah'ım. Sen onları koru ya Rabbi. Allah'ım.
english: God. Protect them, God.
You have me in trouble, mother.
I called for you.
Come, sit here.
Here you go, mother. Ertugrul Bey.
Do I have permission to come in?

text: Halime Sultan. Otağımıza gelir de müsaadenin lafı mı olur?
english: Halime Sultan. Would you excuse me if I came to our tent?
Ertugrul Bey.
I lied to you.
Yes, you said.

text: Şimdi anladın mı neden gitmek zorunda olduğumuzu?
english: Now do you understand why we have to go?

text: Neden baba da geçen günlerin bizim için tez vakitte sona erecek bir rüya olduğunu? Sen burada mutlusun.
english: Why does father have a dream that will come true soon? You are happy here.
Despite your life in the palace...

text: Göçebe bir obada rüyadayım diyorsun ya Halime.
english: You said you were dreaming of a nomadic tribe, Halime.
If the whole world comes together...

text: Yine de mutsuz olmana müsaade etmem.
english: ...I will not let you be unhappy.
Do you understand me, my daughter?
I understand.
Good. I will go now.
...and revolted.

text: Kötü söz söylemek yerine Allah'ın adını al.
english: Instead of saying bad things, take God's name.

text: Duanı et. Yüreğini iyilikle doldur ki...
english: Pray. Fill your heart with goodness...
I wish you well.
I am not going anywhere.
This is not just about my happiness.
It is about my father's brother's life.

text: Merak etme. Babana da kardeşine de bir şey olmasına müsaade etmeyeceğim.
english: Do not worry. I will not let anything happen to your father or your brother.
I will bring them to you safely.
Keep your heart at ease.
The ones stolen from my life.

text: Koparıp alınanlardan geriye kalan ne varsa.
english: ...what is left of what was taken away.
You will take them and leave, Ertugrul.

text: Babamı, kardeşimi. Yalvarırım sen de onlarla dön.
english: My father and my brother. I beg you, you should die with them.
Go back and finish the school inside.
(Music)
If you cannot go back, know that...

text: İçimde eksik olan ne varsa sen de buldun.
english: You found everything I was missing.
They are not up to this, Gokce.
They will send my husband to die for

text: Abla......bak Süleyman Şah da bir insan.
english: Sister, Suleyman Shah is a man.

text: İnsan hiç evladına kıyar mı? Ne olur çıkar şu vesveseleri aklından. Sen Süleyman Şah'ı tanımamışsın daha. O töresi için obasını bile yakar. Mutlaka bir yol bulmalıyım Gökçe mutlaka!
english: Can't you even think about your own son? Get rid of those nonsense. You don't even know Suleyman Shah. He even burns his tribe for his tradition. I must find a way, Gokce. I must!
I will not let them sacrifice my man!
Sister. Ertugrul's Alps are armed and in the same position.
He is waiting to go.
Come on.
I have something to tell you, Kurdoglu.
What is it, Selcan Hatun?

text: Gündoğdu sana güvenir. Seni sayar bilirsin.
english: Gundogdu trusts you. He counts on you, you know that.
What about you, Selcan Hatun?
I always trusted your bravery.

text: Eyvallah. Gündoğdu'nun başına gelenler olur şey değil.
english: Brother Ali, what happens to Gundogdu is not the end of the world.
But do not worry.

text: Süleyman Şah onu getirecektir. Hayır bunu yapmayacak.
english: Suleyman Shah will bring him. No, he won't.
If you are brave...

text: Eğer Süleyman Şah'ın obasını ateşe atmasını istemiyorsan...
english: If you do not want Suleyman Shah to set his tribe on fire...

text: Eğer Gündoğdu'yu biraz olsun seviyorsan... Eğer Süleyman Şah böyle bir şey yaparsa...
english: If you love Gundogdu a little... If Suleyman Shah does something like this...

text: Onu ateşe ben kendi ellerimle atarım.
english: I will throw it into the fire with my own hands.
Now I am listening to you, Selcan Hatun.
Suleyman Shah.
...with Ertugrul...

text: Kara Toygar'ı Kartal Tepesi'nde tuzağa düşürecek.
english: ...will set Kara Toygar in a trap on Kartal Hill.

text: Ne diyorsun sen Selcan Hatun? Kulaklarımla duydum.
english: What are you saying, Selcan Hatun? I heard it with my own ears.

text: Süleyman Şah töresini ezip geçmektense oğlunu ezip geçmeyi tercih etti diyorum sana.
english: I'm telling you that Suleyman Shah chose to crush your son rather than his tradition.
Do not tell anyone about this, Selcan Hatun.

text: Benimle de hiç konuşmadın. Hiç görüşmedik. Tamam mı Selcan Hatun?
english: And you never spoke to me. We never talked to each other. Okay, Selcan Hatun?
What will happen to Gundogdu?
We will find a solution, of course.
Come on, go before anyone sees you.
The first day of the war
Will we let them go, my Bey?

text: Kara Toygar'ın avı daha bereketli olsun diye izin vereceğiz Alpargu. Elim kılıcıma gitmeden, üstüme kan bulaşmadan obayı bütün pisliklerden temizledim.
english: We will let Kara Toygar's tribe prosper, Alpargum. I cleaned the tribe of all filth before I lost my hand and blood.
Come on, jump.
I have something to say to Kara Toygar.

text: Soluk soluğa koşan atlara ant olsun.
english: May the horses run to the left and right.
May God bless those who are born of their own hands!
For our height.
For our Bey.
If I am afraid of dying for our tradition...

text: Kara çelik öz kılıncımla gök ekin gibi biçileyin.
english: I will cut you into pieces with my black steel sword.
May the blue sky split...
May the summer be full of crazyness!
May my name be erased from the bangle of stones.

text: Oğuz babam, kutlu obam ahirette benden davacı olsun.
english: May my father Oghuz and my blessed tribe......be the plaintiff in the hereafter.

text: Çıktığım gaza yolunda Allah yardımcım, Hızır Ata yoldaşım olsun.
english: May God help me on the road to the accident......and may Hizir Atta be my companion.
(Music)
Come on.
Come on Titus, relax a little.
The day is ours.
We will get what we want.

text: Ertuğrul Halep'e giderken de böyle rahattın.
english: You were so relaxed when Ertugrul was going to Aleppo.
You were so loose.
Then, you know.
The incompetence of their men.
Sir, Suleyman Shah.
Yes.
Let us not make our guests wait.
Let them come.
They came alone, sir.
Bring him here, quickly!

text: Bakalım umduğunu mu yoksa bulduğunu mu yiyeceksin Kara Toygar?
english: Let's see if you want it or not, Kara Toygar.
No!
Come on!
What are you doing?
Suleyman Shah!
Where are they?
